I am passionate about delivering high-quality work within specified timelines and maintaining clear communication throughout the project lifecycle.

Collaborate closely with the team, including a designer and technical lead, to refine and improve the applicationâ€™s features. I have good experience of maintaining a clean codebase which is paramount for scalability and maintainability.

 Moreover, I will actively take part in codebase reviews to catch potential bugs and improve code quality but also fosters a culture of knowledge sharing and continuous learning within the team.

 Furthermore, My familiarity with version control systems like Git and understanding branching strategies can facilitate smooth collaboration and code integration within the team. Hope to work with you.
